core
Class MapIO

java.lang.Object
  core.MapIO

public class MapIO
extends java.lang.Object

Handles loading and saving maps. Also handles Base64 encoding and decoding for the tile sheet image.

Constructor Summary

base64Encode

public static char[] base64Encode(byte[] data)
This method generates a base64 character array from a byte array. Usage (Image): BufferedImage image = BUFFEREDIMAGE_CREATED_FROM_IMAGE; ByteArrayOutputStream outputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(); ImageIO.write(image, FILE_EXTENSION, outputStream); char[] encodedImage = MapIO.base64Encode(outputStream.toByteArray()); Usage (String): String string = ""; char[] encodedString = MapIO.base64Encode(string.getBytes()); See documentation if you need to encode something else. Information about Base64 can be found at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64

Parameters:
data - - The byte[] to encode
Returns:
The Base64 encoded char[]

base64Decode

public static byte[] base64Decode(char[] data)
This method decodes a base64 character array and outputs a byte array. Usage (Image): char[] base64Chars = BASE64CHARS; byte[] imageBytes = MapIO.base64Decode(base64Chars); InputStream in = new ByteArrayInputStream(imageBytes); BufferedImage decodedImage = ImageIO.read(in); Usage (String): char[] base64Chars = BASE64CHARS; byte[] stringBytes = MapIO.base64Decode(base64Chars); String decodedString = new String(stringBytes); Information about Base64 can be found at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64

Parameters:
data - - The char[] to be decoded
Returns:
The Base64 decoded byte[]
